summary: The adventures of four young lovers, a group of amateur actors and their interactions with fairies come to light in a moonlit forest.
cast: Derek Godfrey|Barbara Jefford|Nicholas Selby|Hugh Sullivan|David Warner|Diana Rigg|Michael Jayston|Helen Mirren|Paul Rogers|Sebastian Shaw|Bill Travers|Clive Swift|Donald Eccles|John Normington|Ian Richardson|Judi Dench|Ian Holm|Clare Dench|Emma Dench|Alistair Artingstall|Joseph Jones|Richard Woolfenden|Guy Woolfenden|Derek Oldfield|Richard Lee|Michael Tubbs|Martin Best|Ted Valentine|Peter Gordon|Terence Greenidge|Christopher Bond|Robert Davis|David Ashford|Christopher Malcolm|Don Henderson|Dallas Adams|Ray Callaghan|Heather Canning|Natalie Kent|Anna Volska|Katherine Stark|Lynn Moore|Mike Apache|Rick Luben|Miles Richardson
keywords: forest|fairy|shakespeare play|reference to william shakespeare|breaking the fourth wall
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
